channel.title: Posts on Turn the Page
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Turn the Page

item.title: Feedback, What After?
item.description: Recently, I went through a session with my colleagues about giving and receiving feedback. Although my job as a manager is continuous feedback, it always helps to improve on technique or remind myself of how to give and receive feedback properly. We talked about the importance of calibrating views on ourselves and others, and how feedback reduces blind spots we have. Group discussed a sandwich technique, wrap technique, and how giving options to the receiver improves probability of achieving the desired effect.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to my blog. Here I’ll write about topics I’m dealing with or interested in. Probably there will be posts about my management experience, software development trends, and any other topic which intrigued me.
